DihedralPotentialImpl< Interaction > Class Template Reference
Dihedral Potentials

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class McMd::DihedralPotentialImpl< Interaction >

Implementation template for an DihedralPotential.

Member Function Documentation

void readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read dihedral potential parameters.

This method reads the dihedral potential Interaction parameter block. Before calling Evalutor::readParam(), it passes simulation().nBondType() to Interaction::setNAtomType().

Parameters:
ininput parameter stream.

Reimplemented from ParamComposite.

int  type 
) const [inline, virtual]

Returns potential energy for one dihedral.

1 3 4 o o----o \ / o 2

Parameters:
R1bond vector from atom 1 to 2.
R2bond vector from atom 2 to 3.
R3bond vector from atom 3 to 4.
typetype of dihedral.
